author: daxian-dbw
body:
> private static SemanticVersion s_psV6Version = new SemanticVersion(6, 0, 0, "alpha");

It should not be a hard-coded, but instead should be generated based on the `GitCommitId`.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: We agreed to break #3690 down into a few small parts.

title: PSVersion in `$PSVersionTable` is hard-coded in PSVersionInfo.cs
